2 "Gem-" monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Gem-Knight" card from your Deck to your hand. You can pay 1000 LP; Fusion Summon 1 "Gem-Knight" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by shuffling your Fusion Materials listed on it that are banished or in your GY into your Deck, but it cannot attack directly this turn. You can only use each effect of "Gem-Knight Phantom Core" once per turn.
